detaileddescription.para: Adjust the component data after textures have been parsed.

parameterdescription.para: To check if the configuration for the component is there.

simplesect.para: true if this component processes texture data.
true if the component replaces regular map sampling.
true if this component modifies texture coordinates.

briefdescription.para: Removes from given texture flags the ones that are useless given the provided filter.
Fills the texture configuration for use with this component.

simplesect.para: The texture configuration with default configuration for this component.
The texture flags for this component.
The flags for the colour map.
The flags for the opacity map.
The flags for the normal map.
The flags for the height map.
The flags for the occlusion map.

parameterdescription.para: The function to adjust the component data after textures have been parsed.
The function to adjust the component data after materials are blended.

briefdescription.para: Fills the given lists with this component's parsers.

parameterdescription.para: Receives the texture channels and the way to fill them.

briefdescription.para: Fills the sections list with the ones created by this component.
Writes the texture configuration for this component in a scene file.

parameterdescription.para: Holds the texture configuration data for this component.
The current indentation in the output file.

description.para: Pass buffer zeroing (when component is not present in the pass).

briefdescription.para: Fills the material buffer with zero values fot the component data.

parameterdescription.para: To find its data in the buffer.
To find the component's data in the pass entry into the buffer.

briefdescription.para: Removes from given component flags the ones that are useless given the provided filter.

simplesect.para: The pass flags for this component.
The flags for non repeated parallax occlusion mapping.
The flags for repeated parallax occlusion mapping.

briefdescription.para: Tells if the component's lighting shaders are needed.

parameterdescription.para: To check from render pass viewpoint.

briefdescription.para: Applies component's transformations before lighting happens.
